qas.question: What have Christians failed to do regarding a range of fields?

plausible_answers.text: (65.4%) of Nobel Prizes laureates identified Christianity

qas.question: What did the 1901 review of Nobel prizes claim?
What claims that 50% of Nobel Prize laureates identify as Christians?
During which time period did the 200 year Nobel Prize review take place?

context: Christians have <b0_0>made a myriad contributions<b0_0/> in a broad and diverse range of fields, including the sciences, arts, politics, literatures and business. According to <b2_0>100 Years of Nobel Prizes<b2_0/>, a review of Nobel prizes awarded between <b3_0>1901 and 2000<b3_0/> reveals that <b1_0>(65.4%) of Nobel Prizes laureates identified Christianity<b1_0/> in its various forms as their religious preference.
